body_html: With the addition of the --cpu flag it seems to forget that it's building for Android due to a missing crosstool_top flag that is usually passed simultaneously. If you use --fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a instead it should work.
body_text: With the addition of the --cpu flag it seems to forget that it's building for Android due to a missing crosstool_top flag that is usually passed simultaneously. If you use --fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a instead  it should work.
body: With the addition of the --cpu flag it seems to forget that it's building for Android due to a missing crosstool_top flag that is usually passed simultaneously. If you use `--fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a` instead  it should work.
